Obex Alpha â€” Operator Runbook

Start node:
  obex_node --listen 0.0.0.0:8080 --data-dir data/obex-node --peers <comma-separated URLs>

Health & Observability:
  GET /healthz â†’ readiness
  GET /metrics â†’ OpenMetrics text

Endpoints:
  GET /alpha_i/{slot}/{pk}
  GET /alpha_i_index/{slot}
  GET /alpha_iii/{slot}
  GET /header/{slot}
  POST /header
  POST /advance

Notes:
  - Beacon v1 (hash-edge) enforced
  - Size caps enforced before crypto
  - Header-first validation; pulls Î±-III leaves and Î±-I records when peers expose indexes
